text:
des Cebollitas » ( Les petils oignons ») Dix jours avant ses 16 ans, il debute avec
l'équipe d'Argentinos Juniors. Rapidement, il devient le leader de cette équipe. En 166 matches, il marque 115 buts ! Puis, en 1982, il participe à sa première Coupe du monde, en Espagne. Pendant un match de la compétition, il donne un violent coup de pied dans le ventre du Brésilien Batista. Les débats, les haines et les passions commencent sans doute alors pour Maradona.
Toujours en 1982, il rejoint le prestigieux club du Barça, à Barcelone. Mais les journaux S'intéressent surtout à sa vie privée. Le public découvre que Maradona prend de la cocaine. En 1984, il intègre le club du SSC Napoli qui progresse beaucoup grâce à lui.
trans:
of Cebollitas" ("The Little Onions").Ten days before his 16th birthday, he started playing with
Argentinos Juniors team. He soon became the team's leader. He scored 115 goals in 166 matches! Then, in 1982, he took part in his first World Cup, in Spain. During a match in the tournament, he violently kicked Brazil's Batista in the stomach. That was probably the start of the debates, the hatred and the passions for Maradona.
He also joined the prestigious Barça club in Barcelona in 1982. But the newspapers were more interested in his private life. The public discovered that Maradona took cocaine. In 1984, he joined SSC Napoli, a club that made great strides thanks to him.
